verses.verse: Moreover the spirit <S%H7307><s%> lifted me up <S%H5375><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> me unto the east <S%H6931><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>'s house <S%H1004><s%>, which looks <S%H6437><s%> eastward <S%H6921><s%>: and behold at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> men <S%H376><s%>; among <S%H8432><s%> whom I saw <S%H7200><s%> Jaazaniah <S%H2970><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azur <S%H5809><s%>, and Pelatiah <S%H6410><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Benaiah <S%H1141><s%>, princes <S%H8269><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> he unto me <S%H1121><s%>, Son of man <S%H120><s%>, these are the men <S%H582><s%> that devise <S%H2803><s%> mischief <S%H205><s%>, and give <S%H3289><s%> wicked <S%H7451><s%> counsel <S%H6098><s%> in this city <S%H5892><s%>:
Which say <S%H559><s%>, It is not near <S%H7138><s%>; let us build <S%H1129><s%> houses <S%H1004><s%>: this city is the caldron <S%H5518><s%>, and we be the flesh <S%H1320><s%>.
Therefore prophesy <S%H5012><s%> against them <S%H5012><s%>, prophesy, O son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>.

And the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> upon me <S%H559><s%>, and said unto me <S%H559><s%>, Speak; Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; Thus have you said <S%H559><s%>, O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: for I know <S%H3045><s%> the things that come <S%H4609><s%> into your mind <S%H7307><s%>, every one of them.
You have multiplied <S%H7235><s%> your slain <S%H2491><s%> in this city <S%H5892><s%>, and you have filled <S%H4390><s%> the streets <S%H2351><s%> there with the slain <S%H2491><s%>.

Therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; Your slain <S%H2491><s%> whom you have laid <S%H7760><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of it <S%H1320><s%>, they are the flesh, and this city is the caldron <S%H5518><s%>: but I will bring you forth <S%H3318><s%> out of the midst of it <S%H8432><s%>.
You have feared <S%H3372><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%>; and I will bring <S%H935><s%> a sword <S%H2719><s%> upon you <S%H5002><s%>, says the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>.

And I will bring you out <S%H3318><s%> of the midst <S%H8432><s%> there <S%H5414><s%>, and deliver you into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of strangers <S%H2114><s%>, and will execute <S%H6213><s%> judgments among you <S%H8201><s%>.

You shall fall <S%H5307><s%> by the sword <S%H2719><s%>; I will judge <S%H8199><s%> you in the border <S%H1366><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

This city shall not be your caldron <S%H5518><s%>, neither shall you be the flesh <S%H1320><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> there <S%H8199><s%>; but I will judge you in the border <S%H1366><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>:

And you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: for you have not walked <S%H1980><s%> in my statutes <S%H2706><s%>, neither executed <S%H6213><s%> my judgments <S%H4941><s%>, but have done <S%H6213><s%> after the manners <S%H4941><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%> that are round about you <S%H5439><s%>.

And it came to pass <S%H5012><s%>, when I prophesied, that Pelatiah <S%H6410><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Benaiah <S%H1141><s%> died <S%H4191><s%>. Then fell I down <S%H5307><s%> upon my face <S%H6440><s%>, and cried <S%H2199><s%> with a loud <S%H1419><s%> voice <S%H6963><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>, Ah <S%H162><s%> Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>! will you make <S%H6213><s%> a full end <S%H3617><s%> of the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>?
Again the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, your brothers <S%H251><s%>, even your brothers <S%H251><s%>, the men <S%H582><s%> of your relatives <S%H1353><s%>, and all the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> wholly <S%H3427><s%>, are they unto whom the inhabitants of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> have said <S%H559><s%>, Get you far <S%H7368><s%> from the Lord <S%H3068><s%>: unto us is this land <S%H776><s%> given <S%H5414><s%> in possession <S%H4181><s%>.

Therefore say <S%H559><s%>, Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; Although I have cast them far off <S%H7368><s%> among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, and although I have scattered <S%H6327><s%> them among the countries <S%H776><s%>, yet will I be to them as a little <S%H4592><s%> sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> in the countries <S%H776><s%> where they shall come <S%H935><s%>.

Therefore say <S%H559><s%>, Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; I will even gather <S%H6908><s%> you from the people <S%H5971><s%>, and assemble <S%H622><s%> you out of the countries <S%H776><s%> where you have been scattered <S%H6327><s%>, and I will give <S%H5414><s%> you the land <S%H127><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
And they shall come <S%H935><s%> there <S%H5493><s%>, and they shall take away all the detestable things <S%H8251><s%> there and all the abominations there from there <S%H8441><s%>.

And I will give <S%H5414><s%> them one <S%H259><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%>, and I will put <S%H5414><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> spirit <S%H7307><s%> inside <S%H7130><s%> you <S%H5493><s%>; and I will take the stony <S%H68><s%> heart <S%H3820><s%> out of their flesh <S%H1320><s%>, and will give <S%H5414><s%> them a heart <S%H3820><s%> of flesh <S%H1320><s%>:

That they may walk <S%H3212><s%> in my statutes <S%H2708><s%>, and keep <S%H8104><s%> my ordinances <S%H4941><s%>, and do <S%H6213><s%> them <S%H5971><s%>: and they shall be my people, and I will be their God <S%H430><s%>.

But as for them whose heart <S%H3820><s%> walks <S%H1980><s%> after the heart <S%H3820><s%> of their detestable things <S%H8251><s%> and their abominations <S%H8441><s%>, I will recompense <S%H5414><s%> their way <S%H1870><s%> upon their own heads <S%H7218><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>.

Then did the cherubims <S%H3742><s%> lift up <S%H5375><s%> their wings <S%H3671><s%>, and the wheels <S%H212><s%> beside <S%H5980><s%> them <S%H3519><s%>; and the glory of the God <S%H430><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> was over them above <S%H4605><s%>.

And the glory <S%H3519><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> went up <S%H5927><s%> from the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, and stood <S%H5975><s%> upon the mountain <S%H2022><s%> which is on the east side <S%H6924><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>.

Afterwards the spirit <S%H7307><s%> took me up <S%H5375><s%>, and brought <S%H935><s%> me in a vision <S%H4758><s%> by the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> into Chaldea <S%H3778><s%>, to them of the captivity <S%H1473><s%>. So the vision <S%H4758><s%> that I had seen <S%H7200><s%> went up from me <S%H5927><s%>.
Then I spoke <S%H1696><s%> unto them of the captivity <S%H1473><s%> all the things <S%H1697><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had showed me <S%H7200><s%>.
